title: Meu Farnel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Indian, International, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Asian, British, Caribbean, Catering, English, European, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers vegan choices in all cases, including burgers, salads, pizzadillas, wraps, noodles and other plates. All food is made-in-house from scratch. Also sells some biologic products for sale that are also used in the dishes they serve. Will make natural juices when customers request. Has vegan dairy items. Uses local and organic products.
